description: Find current information across major search engines and extract web pages into clean, structured output. Run single or batch searches and scrapes to speed up research and monitoring. Receive JSON or Markdown results with URLs, titles, and summaries for easy analysis.

token.description: Bright Data API key, available in https://brightdata.com/cp/setting/users

browser.description: Optional: Zone name for the Browser API (enables browser control tools, defaults to 'mcp_browser')

unlocker.description: Optional: The Web Unlocker zone name (defaults to 'mcp_unlocker')

capabilities.name: search_engine
capabilities.description: Scrape search results from Google, Bing or Yandex. Returns SERP results in JSON or Markdown (URL, title, description), Ideal forgathering current information, news, and detailed search results.

capabilities.name: scrape_as_markdown
capabilities.description: Scrape a single webpage URL with advanced options for content extraction and get back the results in MarkDown language. This tool can unlock any webpage even if it uses bot detection or CAPTCHA.

capabilities.name: search_engine_batch
capabilities.description: Run multiple search queries simultaneously. Returns JSON for Google, Markdown for Bing/Yandex.

capabilities.name: scrape_batch
capabilities.description: Scrape multiple webpages URLs with advanced options for content extraction and get back the results in MarkDown language. This tool can unlock any webpage even if it uses bot detection or CAPTCHA.
